Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Debt and Dinosaur Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the initial events of the comic, starting with King Guz's staged 'drowning' and rescue to avoid paying debt, followed by Alley Oop's dinosaur troubles and the subsequent decision to trade it in for a new one, leading to a series of humorous and emotional events at a dinosaur dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Debt Avoidance and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz's staged drowning to evade debt and Alley Oop's subsequent confrontation about the unpaid clams, setting up a comedic conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness's Woes
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Alley Oop's journey with Bronto Soreness, highlighting the dinosaur's clumsiness and leading to the diagnosis of its old age.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the conversation about trading in Dinny's dinosaur and Alley Oop's visit to Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership, leading to the test drive.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the justifications for the trade-in, the exciting but problematic test drive, the deal conclusion, and the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Ire
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's initial experiences with his new, smaller dinosaur, characterized by mishaps and the critical reactions of Dinny, leading to a confrontation and Dinny's own dinosaur-related outburst.

sub_scenes.title: New Dinosaur's First Ride and Mishap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur, starting with a salesman pitch and quickly leading to a minor accident.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Scolding and Outburst
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dinny's angry reaction to Alley Oop's mishap, leading to Dinny's own outburst about mistreatment and defense of his own dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Misogynistic Rants
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley Oop's romantic rejection by Ooola, leading to misogynistic musings and conversations among various men about women and relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola's Breakup and Alley Oop's Misogyny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop's invitation to Ooola, her rejection, their breakup, and Ooola's violent reaction, followed by a man's general misogynistic thoughts.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Trip Misogynistic Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents conversations among men during a fishing trip, filled with complaints about women and reinforcing misogynistic stereotypes.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Lessons in Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic rivalry, jealousy, and attempts to understand and learn 'romance' through observation and advice, involving multiple cavemen and Oola.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Affections and Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the idea of competition for Oola's affections and sets up arguments and challenges among cavemen regarding who Oola prefers.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Misunderstanding, and Romantic Aid
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a jealous confrontation, physical attack, and the subsequent revelation of a romantic misunderstanding, leading to tender care and sarcastic commentary.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Rhyming
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the conversation about romance between two cavemen, including defining romance, using analogies, and offering practical advice, culminating in reflection on rhyming.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Gifts and Reactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on various attempts at romantic gestures, including flowers, branches, and petunias, and the differing reactions to these gifts, showcasing romantic competition and misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: Flower and Petunia Rivalry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a caveman offering flowers and another caveman's competitive reaction, vowing to outdo him with petunias.

sub_scenes.title: Branch Offering and Crocodile Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows another romantic gesture with a leafy branch, which leads to an unexpected confrontation with a crocodile.

sub_scenes.title: Vulgarity Observation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is a brief, humorous interlude with a caveman judging tree climbing as vulgar.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Jealousy and Accusations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into various scenarios of romantic jealousy, accusations, and misunderstandings, highlighting volatile relationships and humorous miscommunications.

sub_scenes.title: Past Jealousy and Possessive Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a flashback of anger over stolen affection and a scene of intense possessiveness in a romantic relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Cowardice Accusation and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents an accusation of cowardice and a dramatic misunderstanding involving cannibalism, escalating to a protective intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Finger Eating Accusation and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a jealous accusation of 'finger eating' which is humorously clarified as kissing a baboon's hand.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Punishment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts an accusation of infidelity and immediate physical punishment for a 'two-timing scoundrel'.

sub_scenes.title: Guilt, Forgiveness, and Frenchmen
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays guilt and a plea for forgiveness in a relationship, juxtaposed with a bizarre, unrelated comment about Frenchmen.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic New Leaf and Courting Gesture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a declaration of romantic change and a polite, traditional courting gesture.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustration with Women
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene returns to the fishing theme with a caveman expressing his ongoing frustration and incomprehension of women.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores a dance craze called 'the twitch', detailing its injuries, attempts to learn it, and unexpected dangers of even watching it.

sub_scenes.title: Twist-Related Injuries
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the comedic consequence of 'the twist' dance – frequent injuries like dislocated hips.

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Learn the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the social pressure on Alley Oop to learn 'the twitch' despite his reluctance.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson Mishaps and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers a 'twitch' dance lesson, filled with clumsy foot-stepping and ending with a humorous name reveal of the instructor.

sub_scenes.title: Nightly Debrief, Prank, and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the lesson, including a debrief, a humiliating prank, and a surprising revelation of injuries caused by watching 'the twitch'.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a time travel narrative initiated for historical research, unexpectedly transporting characters to the past and back, intertwining with romantic moments.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Research Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the premise of time travel as a solution for historical research, leading to the plan to contact a 'cave-man friend'.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Prehistoric Romance and Accidental Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to prehistoric times, showing Alley and Oola in a romantic setting, which is abruptly interrupted by accidental time travel to the present.

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Assignment and Return to Spain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley and Oola's arrival in the 20th century, Wonmug's assignment in Spain, and their quick return to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain
Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment

Major_Arcs.title: Buster's Bullfight Debacle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates Buster's disruptive serenade, his confrontation leading to an attack on a famous matador, and his unexpected role as a 'novelty' bullfighter, resulting in chaos and a surprising victory.

sub_scenes.title: Buster's Noisy Serenade and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Buster's loud serenade, the annoyed reactions of neighbors, and a direct confrontation over his disruptive behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony

sub_scenes.title: Attack on Matador and Bullfight Chaos
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Buster's attack on a man with a guitar, the revelation that the victim is a famous matador, and the resulting bullfight delay.

narrative_arcs.title: The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight Performance and Outcome
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the 'novelty' bullfight itself, including audience reactions, Buster's underestimation of the bull, and his surprising victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Reunions (Page 26)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic misunderstandings and eventual reunions, including accusations of infidelity, a flirtatious exchange, a rescue scenario, and a delayed kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Waiting for Information and Romantic Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up a woman impatiently waiting for information and then transitions to a flirtatious scene promising romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Reunion, and Delayed Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a rescue scenario, a reunion, and the anticipation of a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene combines elements from previous scenes, with an infidelity accusation and a shift back to the original information-seeking purpose, alongside a humorous background comment.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of being 'King for a Day', depicting the burdens and manipulations associated with temporary power and the reactions of both the 'king' and the populace.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept, showing the crowned man being carried and hailed as king amidst complaints.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Kingship Burden Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation faced by the 'king' and a dialogue that questions the perceived ease of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Public Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the appointment of a temporary king, the public's negative reaction to him, and the former king's manipulative justification.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification

sub_scenes.title: New King's Isolation and Former King's Satisfaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the new king's isolated experience and the former king's satisfaction with his manipulative scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Domestic Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts Guz's domestic life, centered around his attempts at leisure, his wife's (the Queen's) displeasure, and comedic punishments.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Misunderstanding and Ulcer Pills
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Guz's enjoyment of 'bon-bons' which are actually ulcer pills and the Queen's disgusted reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust

sub_scenes.title: Dirty Feet Punishment and Tub Vacation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Queen punishing Guz for dirty feet and Guz's sarcastic reaction while washing his feet.

narrative_arcs.title: True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around a dispute over found clams, the crowned man's attempt to resolve it, and the Wise Man's unconventional solution.

sub_scenes.title: Rum-Pus Cheating and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a cheating accusation and a physical fight seemingly related to money.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the dispute is over found clams and leads to the crowned man seeking the Wise Man's help for resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Recurring Conflicts and Royal Life
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts recurring conflicts and everyday aspects of royal life, including street fights, financial accusations, and the crowned man's dining experience and health concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Street Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the recurrence of a street fight involving the same two men from previous disputes.

sub_scenes.title: Financial Accusation in Royal Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a financial accusation by the crowned man against a servant.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the crowned man's anticipation and enjoyment of dinosaur dinner, interrupted by a health warning about his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: Peek-a-boo Prank and Sudden Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts a playful peek-a-boo prank with a sudden and unexpected violent attack, creating a stark shift in tone.

sub_scenes.title: Playful Peek-a-boo Prank
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a seemingly lighthearted peek-a-boo prank.

sub_scenes.title: Sudden Violent Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene abruptly transitions from playfulness to a violent attack, revealing a hidden aggression.

Major_Arcs.title: Various Short Scenes of Apology and Role Reversal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc comprises a collection of short, disparate scenes involving apologies, role reversals, and unusual propositions, each briefly exploring different scenarios and character interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Oompa's Unclear Apology
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents Oompa apologizing for an unclear action that caused Guz to fall.

sub_scenes.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a deep apology from Pal accompanied by a food offering.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ordinary Citizen Status
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a character's relief at returning to ordinary life after palace involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents Alley's unexpected proposition for another character to become ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Board Measurement and Strange Duck Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is a brief, puzzling scene involving board measurement and an unexplained 'strange duck' reaction.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Act: Forced Shaving and Fortune Telling
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the 'Barberous Act', revealing it to be a forced shaving scenario connected to a fortune telling prophecy and Ooola's brief appearance.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling Premise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a woman visiting a fortune teller, excited about a prophecy of meeting a bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola's Wait and Forced Shaving Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene briefly features Ooola waiting and transitions to the setup for forced shaving with violence and coercion.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving in Moo Parlor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the 'Barberous Act' to be forced shaving in 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor'.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a scientist's time machine experiment and its unexpected outcome - the arrival of a Roman soldier instead of a prehistoric visitor.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the scientist's time machine experiment and his intention to bring someone from the past to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Roman Soldier Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the materialization from the time machine, revealing the surprising arrival of a Roman soldier.
